sentences.sContent: In Australia, climate change is a political football, kicked about in the power game played in Canberra.
sentences.sCn: 在澳大利亚，气候变化是政治足球，在堪培拉的权力游戏中被踢来踢去。

sentences.sContent: Canberra needs the relationship - and the guarantees of military assistance that go with it - far more than Washington does.
sentences.sCn: 堪培拉需要这种关系，以及随之而来的军援保证，远远超过华盛顿对这种关系的需要。

sentences.sContent: Kylie Catchpole, a research fellow at the Australian National University in Canberra, says the design is promising because it works over a broad band of the spectrum.
sentences.sCn: 凯莉·卡崔布尔，堪培拉的澳洲国立大学的一名女研究员，说道这项设计很有前景因为研究的是宽频带的光谱。
